Articles.Content:
It took quite a bit of engineering to get this thing into orbit, but here it is! This here is my modular, long range Heavy Tanker.

It is equipped with six nuclear engines and one Skipper engine for high thrust manuvers when the nuclear engines just won't cut it. Not to mention it looks cool

It holds a crew of one Kerbal and has multiple docking ports for additional fuel tanks and other oddities.

It is currently untested outside of Kerbin's Sphere of influence. However, Given the amount of fuel it has (with out the modular external fuel tanks, it has two internal Rocomax 64 tanks and a large RCS tank) I'm confident it can make it to Duna or beyond.

For those who are interested, here's the craft file -->http://www./view/qlyykkwkqckl1gm/Sorenti_Heavy_Tanker.craft

Enjoy!

(I haven't included the modular tanks because they still need some tweaking....) :l

Edited June 4, 2013 by Chozo Nomad
